channel.title: My account.. Gone forever?
channel.description: Let me tell you the story line of this first..: My account is old, older then you might think. Now it wasn't my first one. But, it was my best. I made it some time in 2005. Being 2011 I should be able to get veterans, but that's besides the point. Late 2010 early 2011, I started getting hacked, it went from once a month to once a week. Around April I started botting, and the hackings stopped. Well with the botting I was getting rich. I did some things I'm not to proud of (stole money for rsgp) and that can't be undone. But I had around 300m for the first time in my Runescape career. Then, I was hacked, scared shitless, I recovered asap. I lost around 150 of that 300m (Blue H'ween was on loan luckily.) Pissed off, I stopped playing for a couple days and let my bot do dungoneering non-stop (stupid JaGex never noticed). Again, I started paying money for RSGP.. Got back up to 500m this time. Was stupid, bought a second account, and another rare. Once again I got hacked but this time I lost it all. I couldn't even recover the account this time. I was grateful I had the second account I just bought. It was very high ranked and had some spending money on it I transferred over. Well the original owner stole it back and I lost that too. Now I'm down 2 accounts and around 800m. I've sent in about 50+ Account theft appeals and like 20 emails. I haven't got it back yet. Do you think I should keep trying, or just give up?

item.title: My account.. Gone forever?
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

RuneScape Discussion Rules [Updated March 12, 2013]

No ‘I got hacked’ posts/threads.

Read full topic

item.title: My account.. Gone forever?
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

reyx7:

Your mopar account is about to be gone forever too.

I’ve been told that before.

@OP - My only suggestion is to stop buying anything for runescape besides a membership. Some black market accounts are targeted by the companies employees. Mainly because it’s the black market, who will you be told? I suggest making an account and playing legit for once.

Read full topic

item.title: My account.. Gone forever?
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude462 sk8rdude462
item.description:
@sk8rdude462 wrote:

[quote=“the elve age, post:14, topic:424508”][quote author=sk8rdude462 link=topic=527163.msg3842009#msg3842009 date=1323309433]

He stole IRL money for RSGP. People sell drugs/babies for RSGP, let it go.

First of all, you deserve to get hacked, because you are FOOLISH to keep logging onto your account without even checking or thinking you had a keylogger. Well obviously something is wrong if you kept getting hacked. Good bye $500

I used 2 different computers to change my pass. both had no virus.
[/quote]So you kept repeatedly got hacked, yet you thought you were safe? Did you have any logic behind keeping your account safe?[/quote]
I used a system restore. Kind of deletes EVERYTHING off the computer as if it were brand new. Then I changed my pass. and I was still hacked…

Read full topic

item.title: My account.. Gone forever?
item.dc:creator: @the_elve_age the elve age
item.description:
@the_elve_age wrote:

[quote=“vManlyMan, post:6, topic:424508”][quote author=sk8rdude462 link=topic=527163.msg3841958#msg3841958 date=1323307475]

I did some things I’m not to proud of (stole money for rsgp) ,

And with this I stop reading. Pretty sure you should be banned from Mopar.

I didn’t even do it on here. and that was past. I stopped doing that.
[/quote]

Doesn’t matter if it’s on here. And who cares if you stopped doing it? If I was an admin, you would already be gone. Scammers are trash, and should be treated as trash.[/quote]He stole IRL money for RSGP. People sell drugs/babies for RSGP, let it go.

First of all, you deserve to get hacked, because you are FOOLISH to keep logging onto your account without even checking or thinking you had a keylogger. Well obviously something is wrong if you kept getting hacked. Good bye $500

Read full topic
